Question
========
True or false? If an object is moving to the right, then its acceleration must also be to the right.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False

Solution
========
False. An object that is moving to the right at a constant speed has zero acceleration and an object that is moving right and slowing down has a leftward acceleration.
